HOME APPLIANCE REPAIR

Having any household appliance, such as a vacuum cleaner as an immediate
example, broken can easily break anyone down.

WHO IS SOLUFIX

A BIT ABOUT US

Solufix isn’t the guy offering home repair services from the back of his pickup truck.

Solufix is your personal home improvement consultant and a trusted, knowledgeable resource that is part of a leading national service franchise.

Our experienced, professional home repair and improvement technicians are skilled craftsmen with an average of 10 years of experience in the trades.

We’re so confident in the work we perform that each job we do, whether a repair, installation, assembly or organization task, is backed by our Done Right Guarantee.
